metadata.title: CVE-2020-13329 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions from 12.6.2 priorto 12.10.13. GitLab was vulnerable to a stored XSS by in the blob viewfeature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
